short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automatically jumps the recipe card to the top of the page on recipe sites

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
No more infinite scrolling through recipe blogs when all you want is to see the recipe. With this extension, the recipe will jump to the top of the page! It's not Jump to Recipe, instead, the recipe jumps to you!

Use the save feature to create a list of all of your top recipes.
